title: Veiled
description: Secrets are sexy for thriller novelist, Jacob Carter. He loves the local fetish club because it's full of them. So is the sexy woman he's neverseen without her black mask.Angeline hides horrid truths behind the beautiful ebony wood, and she'sterrified Jacob will discover them. When the masks fall away, will hesee the woman he's spent hours talking to, or will she lose him forever?
author: Ava Delany
